name: @reflex/trackingserver
description: Platform-independent server application using ASP.NET Core as backend and Angular as frontend.

scripts.build:electron-win: cd .. & electronize build .\ReFlex.TrackingServer.csproj /PublishSingleFile false /PublishReadyToRun false /p:Configuration=Release /p:Platform=x64 /target win
scripts.build:electron-osx: cd .. && electronize build .\ReFlex.TrackingServer.csproj /PublishSingleFile false /PublishReadyToRun false /p:Configuration=Release /p:Platform=x64 /target win
scripts.build:electron-osx-arm64: cd .. && electronize build .\ReFlex.TrackingServer.csproj /PublishSingleFile false /PublishReadyToRun false /p:Configuration=Release /p:Platform=ARM64 /target custom "osx-arm64;" /electron-arch arm64
scripts.build:electron-linux: cd .. && electronize build ./ReFlex.TrackingServer.csproj /PublishSingleFile false /PublishReadyToRun false /p:Configuration=Release /p:Platform=x64 /target win
scripts.build:electron-linux-arm64: cd .. && electronize build .\ReFlex.TrackingServer.csproj /PublishSingleFile false /PublishReadyToRun false /p:Configuration=Release /p:Platform=ARM64 /target custom "linux-arm64;" /electron-arch arm64

author: Mathias MÃ¼ller
